title: Blood donation urged during pandemic to prevent shortage - Toronto Sun
description: Blood donation urged during pandemic to prevent shortage Toronto Sun 'It's safe': Canadians urged to continue donating blood amid coronavirus spread CTV News Canadian Blood Services experiencing appointment cancellations - Kelowna News Castanet.net Coronaviru…
content: The COVID pandemic doesn t mean healthy eligible people shouldn t donate blood Canadian Blood Services CBS which handles blood donations everywhere in the country but Quebec wants everyone to know that it s still safe to donate during the coronavirus chars
